text: USA my country this is the story of the
tough life of brick makers in
Antananarivo Madagascar bricks bricks
bricks over the last three days I've
seen tens of thousands of brick makers
working their butts off on street
corners and in brick fields spread
across the city which go on forever and
ever and there's massive mounds of
bricks this is the biggest brick oven
you'll ever see in your life but the
most condensed area is in my friend
Dave's village what's the name of the
village he and his friends have been
explaining to me about this brick
madness what is most surprising to me is
that it's not only adults putting in the
strength in ours it's also kids really
young kids now that got him working
young I've never seen this much physical
labor going into one massive project in
my life these working conditions are
brutal like I'm wearing sunglasses but
I've so much ash my hide it's hard to
breathe over here these people are the
most hard-working people you'll ever
find true warriors and they make around
$1.00 per day I wanted to learn more
about their brick making jobs so I set
out to investigate further and interview
them Bonjour oh he's making the bricks
how many bricks do you make in one day
1501 de Bracy made today already
[Music]
got my camera then we came across this
innocent face Salaam Salaam who is
digging everyday from five to eight in
his bare feet how much money does he
make he made eight thousand and that is
two two and a half dollars so his only
job is digging no other job and lastly I
caught up with some brick throwers who
can be seen on every street corner god
these are heavy
so it's really impressive he's picking
up two bricks every time and filling two
bricks at this guy who catches it no
problem oh they live right there and
they swim over this water to work every
morning you see I've never seen guys
work as hard as these guys they're
honestly more efficient than machines
using their bare hands to toss bricks
it's insane it's really mind-blowing to
see so many people working so hard in
this extremely polluted air I can barely
breathe after one hour of filming this
so I can't imagine working all day in
the hot Sun making bricks but for these
innocent people who grew up in this
society they don't have much of a choice
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
